sections.body: This Act may be called the Pakistan Engineering Council Act, 1975. It extends to the whole of Pakistan and shall come into force at once.

In this Act, unless there is anything repugnant in the subject or the context, various definitions are provided for terms such as 'Accreditation Committee', 'accredited engineering qualification', 'bye-laws', 'Chairman', etc.

sections.section_title: Constitution and incorporation of Engineering Council
sections.body: There shall be constituted an Engineering Council to be known as the Pakistan Engineering Council, which shall be a body corporate having perpetual succession and a common seal.
The general direction and administration of the Council and its affairs shall vest in the Governing Body.
